HELP_TILE_CONTENT_FEATURE_REQUEST.description: Content for the first Help Tile
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_FEATURE_REQUEST.message: We have detailed documentation for the Sonatype Platform Browser Extension available below. We greatly value feedback. You can open a GitHub Issue with your idea or question or reach out to your dedicated Customer Success representative.

HELP_TILE_CONTENT_RAISE_BUG.description: Content for the first Help Tile
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_RAISE_BUG.message: We greatly value feedback. If you believe you have found a bug, please open an Issue and provide as much information as you can including:

HELP_TILE_CONTENT_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.description: Content for the first Help Tile
HELP_TILE_CONTENT_WHERE_TO_GET_HELP.message: We have detailed documentation for the Sonatype Platform Browser Extension available

HELP_TILE_TITLE_RAISE_BUG.message: I think I found a bug - who do I tell?

HELP_TITLE_CONTENT_BUG_DETAIL_2.description: Second item of detail we request when raising a Bug

LABEL_ENABLE_NOTFIICATIONS_DESCRIPTION.message: When enabled, we'll use System Notifications to alert you about Components threats.

LABEL_ENABLE_PAGE_ANNOTATIONS.description: Label for Enable Page Annotations option

LABEL_ENABLE_PAGE_ANNOTATIONS_DESCRIPTIO.description: Label for Enable Page Annotations option
LABEL_ENABLE_PAGE_ANNOTATIONS_DESCRIPTIO.message: When enabled, we'll use annotate the current page to alert you about Component threats.

LABEL_LOG_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION.message: Controls how much logging is sent to your browser console. WARN is a safe value for normal operation.

LABEL_URL.description: Label for the field where you input your Sonatype IQ Server URL

LEGAL_DECLARED_LICENSE.description: The declared license of the component

LEGAL_EFFECTIVE_LICENSE.description: The effective license of the component

LEGAL_OBSERVED_LICENSE.description: The observed license of the component

LINK_BUG_REPORT.description: Link text used for reporting a bug.

LINK_FEATURE_REQUEST.description: Link text used for making a feature request.

LINK_TEXT_HERE.description: Link text used for generic link to something [here].

OPTIONS_ERROR_MESSAGE_UNAUTHENTICATED.description: Error message showed if Sonatype IQ credentials are incorrect
OPTIONS_ERROR_MESSAGE_UNAUTHENTICATED.message: There was an error signing in.

OPTIONS_INFO_MESSAGE_CHOOSE_APPLICATION.description: Info message to direct to choose an Application
OPTIONS_INFO_MESSAGE_CHOOSE_APPLICATION.message: Please select an application from the list above.

OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_PAGE_TITLE.description: Page Title for Options page upon first installation
OPTIONS_INSTALL_MODE_PAGE_TITLE.message: Thanks for installing the Sonatype Platform Browser Extension

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_BUTTON_GRANT_PERMI.message: Grant Permissions to your Sonatype IQ Server

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_1.description: First point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_1.message: Enter the URL for your Sonatype IQ Server and then grant the permissions needed for this extension to communicate with your Sonatype IQ Server.

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_2.description: Second point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_2.message: Provide your username and token for your Sonatype IQ Server. Then connect to retrieve the list of available applications.

OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_3.description: Third point of configuration for Sonatype IQ Server
OPTIONS_PAGE_SONATYPE_POINT_3.message: Select an Application from the list available on your Sonatype IQ Server.

OPTIONS_PAGE_TAB_GENERAL_CONFIGURATION.description: Options Tab name for General Configuration

OPTIONS_PAGE_TAB_SONATYPE_IQ.description: Options Tab name for Sonatype IQ Configuration

OPTIONS_PAGE_TAB_SONATYPE_NEXUS_REPOSITO.description: Options Tab name for Sonatype Nexus Repository Configuration

OPTIONS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE.description: Success message to display once Sonatype IQ has been configured
OPTIONS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE.message: Congratulations! You successfully authenticated with your Sonatype IQ Server and have an application selected! You may close this browser tab to continue.

POLICY_TABLE_POLICY.description: The column header in the policy table for policy

POLICY_TABLE_THREAT.description: The column header in the policy table for threat

POPUP_TAB_LEGAL.description: Legal/License top-level tab in Popup. List of licenses for this component

POPUP_TAB_POLICY.description: Policy violations top-level tab in Popup. All policy violations for this component.

POPUP_TAB_REMEDIATION.description: List of recommended version as well as a complete list of the versions available.

POPUP_TAB_SECURITY.description: Security (CVEs) top-level tab in Popup. List of CVEs for this component

RECOMMENDED_VERSIONS.description: The list of the recommended version from Lifecycle

RELEASE_NOTES_PAGE_TITLE.description: Page Title for Release Notes page

SECURITY_TABLE_CVSS.description: The column header in the security table for cvss

SECURITY_TABLE_ISSUE.description: The column header in the security table for issue

SIDEBAR_LINK_GETTING_STARTED.description: Sidebar Navigation Link in Options Page

SIDEBAR_RELEASE_NOTES.description: Sidebar Navigation Link in Options Page

SONATYPE_LIFECYCLE.description: Branded product name for Sonatype Lifecycle

SONATYPE_LIFECYCLE_ALP.description: Branded product name for Advanced Legal Pack for Sonatype Lifecycle
